Name: minimize_unscheduled_tasks
Description: Tasks must be in a sprint backlog (cannot be outside)

Name: minimize_unassigned_worker_roles
Description: Workers should have at least one role

Name: minimize_unplanned_epics
Description: Epics should reside in a product backlog

Name: minimize_sprint_without_goal
Description: Each sprint must have a sprint goal

Name: minimize_exceeded_sprint_duration
Description: Sprint end_date should be after start_date

Name: minimize_overallocated_team_size
Description: Team size should not exceed capacity

Name: minimize_unmoderated_events
Description: Key Scrum events should have moderation

Name: minimize_untracked_velocity
Description: Velocity records should reference a team
